Class Collider

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.Collider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class Collider extends Object implements Cloneable, Serializable
Represents a collision detection component using a circular collider. This class provides methods to check for overlaps, clone the collider, and manipulate its position.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Collider

      public Collider(Object colliderFigure)
      Constructs a new Collider using the provided figure. The figure must be of type Circle.
      Parameters:
      colliderFigure - the collision figure to use (must be an instance of Circle)
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterInitializationException - if the provided figure is not a Circle

  • Method Details

    • getCircleCollider

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Circle getCircleCollider()
      Gets the circle collider associated with this Collider.
      Returns:
      the Circle representing the collider

    • setCircleCollider

      public void setCircleCollider(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Circle circleCollider)
      Sets the circle collider for this Collider.
      Parameters:
      circleCollider - the Circle to set as the collider

    • overlaps

      public boolean overlaps(Collider targetCollider)
      Checks if this collider overlaps with another collider.
      Parameters:
      targetCollider - the target Collider to check for overlap
      Returns:
      true if the colliders overlap, false otherwise

    • clone

      public Collider clone()
      Creates a deep clone of this Collider, copying its circle collider.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      a cloned Collider object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is no collider figure to clone

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position)
      Sets the position of the collider.
      Parameters:
      position - the new Vector2 position to set

    • move

      public void move(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 translation)
      Moves the collider by the given translation vector.
      Parameters:
      translation - the Vector2 translation to apply to the collider's position

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Checks if this collider is equal to another object. Two colliders are considered equal if they have the same circle collider.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare to
      Returns:
      true if the colliders are equal, false otherwise

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns the hash code of this Collider. The hash code is based on the circle collider's hash code.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
      Returns:
      the hash code of this Collider
